ca.etsmtl.log430.lab1
Class Termio

java.lang.Object
  ca.etsmtl.log430.lab1.Termio

public class Termio
extends java.lang.Object

This utility class contains methods that allow callers to perform various I/O operations at the command line.

Version:
1.3, 2012-Feb-02
Author:
A.J. Lattanze

          Reads a single character from the keyboard and returns it to the caller.

          If the input string represents number, convert it to a double and return it to the caller.
 float toFloat(java.lang.String stringItem)
          If the input string represents a number, convert it to a float and return it to the caller, otherwise a NumericFormatException is raised and a message is printed for the caller.

public char keyboardReadChar()
Reads a single character from the keyboard and returns it to the caller.

isNumber

public boolean isNumber(java.lang.String stringItem)
Determines if the input string represents a number. If an integer is passed (for example 4), then the program will assume that it is a floating point number (for example 4.0).

Parameters:
stringItem -
Returns:
true if the string represents a numeric value, false otherwise.

toFloat

public float toFloat(java.lang.String stringItem)
If the input string represents a number, convert it to a float and return it to the caller, otherwise a NumericFormatException is raised and a message is printed for the caller.

Parameters:
stringItem -
Returns:
The input string as a float.

toDouble

public double toDouble(java.lang.String stringItem)
If the input string represents number, convert it to a double and return it to the caller. Otherwise, a NumericFormatException is raised and a message is printed for the caller.

Parameters:
stringItem -
Returns:
The input string as a double.

toInteger

public int toInteger(java.lang.String stringItem)
If the input string represents number, convert it to an integer and return it to the caller. Otherwise, a NumericFormatException is raised and a message is printed for the caller.

Parameters:
stringItem -
Returns:
The input string as an integer.
